#summary Needs are part of the AntiCultureWorld project.

A *Need* represents a need which [Entity entities] (notably [Human humans]) have. Some needs are vital for an [Entity entity] while some others are just a big disadvantage when not fulfilled or over fulfilled.

==Genetic aspect of Needs==
Each need is written as a float number inside a [Gene gene]. These float number represent the ideal value for the current status' level.

==Variable status aspect of Needs==
A Need's current status level is variable. Time and some [Operations operations] may change it.

==List of Needs==
  * [Integrity Health]
  * [Food]
  * [Water]
  * [Sleep]
  * [Light]
  * [Heat]
  * [Happiness]
  * [SocialCohesion]
  * [IntellectualStimulation]
  * [ChildBirth]
  * [MaleOrgasm]
  * [FemaleOrgasm]
  * [Aggression]
